examples: I yelled at the dogs to make them go away.
I really missed her when she went away.
When are you going back to your house?
I'll have to go back for my umbrella.
We can always go back to the original plan if necessary.

en: to move past, in space or time

examples: We go by the coffee shop everyday.
You can watch the trains going by from this window.
You can't let an opportunity like that go by - it's too good to miss.
The house was a train station in days gone by.
Could you buy a paper for me if you go by a newsagents?
